Name: Zoning, SPARC Pedestrian Bridge City Map Change, Manhattan (C 240309 MMM).
Title: Application number C 240309 MMM (SPARC Pedestrian Bridge City Map Change) submitted by the New York City Economic Development Corporation pursuant to Sections 197-c and 199 of the New York City Charter for an amendment to the City Map involving: the elimination of the pedestrian overpass over FDR Drive at East 25 Street and the adjustment of grades, block dimensions and angles necessitated thereby, including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map No. 30272 dated June 12, 2024 and signed by the Borough President, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 6, Council District 4.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises

Attachments.Name: Calendar of the Zoning Subcommittee Meeting - January 9, 2025
